comment: Never even took off the shrinkwrap before I sold it just recently. Another game that is widely popular, but it was not for me.

Based on Diplomacy, Machiavelli is a lot more complicated game, adding economical concerns to the basic negotiation game. Too long and complicated for regular use.

Avoid.
Lost this in a move.....  A little too much like diplomacy.
Diplomacy plus stuff. The additions are fiddly and add some chaos to the game. This is not necessarily a worse game than Diplomacy, but for my tastes the changes were a detriment.
What if I took Diplomacy and added a bunch of rules to it?
Excellent game with layers of strategy, haven't been able to find players since college!
El juego que comenzó todo. Pasan los años y sigue siendo un pepino en toda regla.
